lead_paragraph: GREENFELD--Marvin, on January 21, 2016, of New York City, formerly of Alexandria, VA, died peacefully shortly before his 91st birthday. Devoted husband to the late Renee E. Greenfeld and to second wife the late Marilyn Bartick. Loving father to Anne M. Greenfeld, Stephen S. Greenfeld, and the late Lawrence I. Greenfeld, and loving stepfather to Melissa Bartick. A WWII Veteran, he had a long professional career in electrical engineering and management, loved jazz and classical music-he was an outstanding trumpet player-and was an unreformed punster. Our father also frequently contributed to dozens of charitable organizations. Funeral service will be held on Tuesday, January 26, 2016, 12pm at Judean Memorial Gardens Chapel, 16225 Batchellors Forest Rd., Olney, MD. Interment will immediately follow in Judean Memorial Gardens Cemetery. 1/3
